name: Skin Brightening Facial Moisturizer (Sorrel Infused) 3.5 oz
description: Introducing our powerful yet gentle face cream, infused with the natural goodness of Rumex acetosa, a potent botanical extract that helps to brighten and even out your skin tone. This luxurious face cream is specially formulated to nourish, hydrate, and revitalize your skin, leaving it looking and feeling radiant and healthy. Rumex acetosa, also known as sheep's sorrel, is a natural skin lightening agent that helps to reduce the appearance of dark spots, hyperpigmentation, and other discolorations.
